page.title: 19Our Village
page.content: Our homes are situated in cilfynydd,which is an old mining village.It is a small,qiet village with only a few shops which are all in one street. Our homes are terraced houses ,as are most in our village,with dark stones and grey,slate roofs.They are quite big with three bedrooms,a bathroom,livingroom and kitchen.my grandmother and grandfather used to live in my house. After school at 4:30 PM we play in the streets on our roller skates or bicycles or walk on the surrounding mountains or the park near the new comprehensive school. Most of the old people in this village remember the coalmine which was once in our village.
